responses.rationale: The segment reports a negative fact (bird loss) but does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports negative facts (culling numbers) but does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports a factual detail about a location but does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports past negative facts (culling, price impact) but does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes an ongoing situation but does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes planned response measures ('will be killed', 'will be slaughtered') without active reassurance.
The segment describes a standard safeguard/protocol ('entire flock is killed as to keep it... from spreading') without active reassurance.
The segment reports detection of the virus but does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
